name: ZeroX King
description: 0xK brings Meme coins into a new track, making coin holders feel that they are not speculators, but a game of wealth and power. 0xK It’s not a token, it’s a key. A raw, pure, almost dark crypto power. Kill Switch Mechanism Token destruction is not 'Burn', but 'Kill'. Each transaction Kills 1% of the amount. Born accidentally from network congestion and code entropy, its address starts with 0xK, declaring itself the King of all addresses.
